name: Journey to Aurora
description:
This game was made for our two week Pre-Semester 2 Game Jam where the theme was a road trip, and the city that we had to make the game about was Bergen, Norway.

Credits:

Franco De Marco - Producer & Game Designer -  https://frankfreak.itch.io/
Mindaugas Juodvirsis - Programmer - https://mufake.itch.io/
Semra Usanmaz - Programmer & Game Designer - https://semrausanmaz.itch.io/
Ramone Graham - Programmer & Menu Designer - https://sweetboy13735.itch.io/
Namrata Patel - 3D Modeller & 2D Artist
David Toussaint - 3D Modeller & Game Designer  - https://david-toussaint.itch.io/
Abdulhakeem - Sound & Audio
Ian Awity - Sound & Audio & 3D Modeller
Donelle Quagraine - Sound & Audio Supervisor 

Hope you enjoy playing it as much as we did making it.
